content: * **Alternatively, Cloud Step will get you past ranged attackers without being spotted.** If you prefer a stealthier approach, or you're just trying to get beyond a row of archers, using the Cloud Step spell can help massively. Enemies will focus on your replica and leave you to sneak past.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Essential_Tips_and_Tricks.md', within the main section titled 'Essential Tips and Tricks', specifically from the subsection 'Combat Tips'.
The content is as follows:
* **Alternatively, Cloud Step will get you past ranged attackers without being spotted.** If you prefer a stealthier approach, or you're just trying to get beyond a row of archers, using the Cloud Step spell can help massively. Enemies will focus on your replica and leave you to sneak past.
